meanings.sent1: The poor boy felt deep mortification when he tripped and spilled his lunch in front of everyone.
meanings.sent2: Her face turned red with mortification when she realized she had been talking loudly in a quiet library.
meanings.sent3: The mortification of accidentally wearing mismatched socks to a fancy event made her laugh at herself.
meanings.sent4: The mortification of forgetting her lines on stage felt like a spotlight on her mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The mortification of being caught singing in the shower by her crush was unforgettable.
